title: Bug 101187 - Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description:
When trying to add a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. ...
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title when the localization key is blank.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank but still has a valid value, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Go to the localization settings
3. Add a localization key and leave it blank
4. Save the changes
5. Observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title
